{{Description|The [[Grand Narukami Shrine]] sits on the summit of [[Mt. Yougou]]. Under the shadows of the [[Sacred Sakura]], the wind softly carries a blanket of sakura petals.|[https://twitter.com/genshinimpact/status/1453209841548288000 Twitter]}}
'''Miko's Night''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Realm of Tranquil Eternity]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 47]].
